document.discussion_title: Crane hits 3 World Trade Center under construction
document.topic_text: NEW YORK (AP) — Part of a crane struck the 12th floor of 3 World Trade Center , which is still under construction, New York City officials said Thursday. Fire officials said a crane had lowered material to the ground at about 8:30 p.m.
